titleStmt.title: The mad mans plea: or, A sober defence of Captaine Chillintons church. Shewing the destruction and derision ready to fall on all the baptized churches, not baptized with fire, whose forms of religion shall be made ridiculous among men, when the power of righteousness and glorious appearance of God in his people shall come to the nation. By W. E.
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.
